Name: Phantom Train
About the game: I was in a hurry home from work. It was already dark and frosty - December, after all. Since I worked in one city and lived in another, I had to travel by train. In the morning - to work, in the evening - home. The journey took a little less than an hour. Today is Friday, the mood is high. Climbing onto a deserted platform, I began to wait for the train. There was not a soul on the platform: it was on the outskirts, next to the industrial zone, and here, as a rule, there were always few people, but today it is completely empty. In this game you will have to solve puzzles related to the history of this world, and find a way out into the real world. Or you can plunge headlong into another world and find your way in other people's cities, gigakhrushchevka (Samosbor), or find the main carriage in an endless train. You have to follow the character, trade and search for resources. You will need to make choices about how to move forward in the story and what you will sacrifice.
